skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hectic quiz
des:
The most intense and up to date quiz on Amazon. Play Hectic Quiz to compete against friends and family and get your Daily Brain Workout and improve your General Knowledge with Hectic Quiz!

Each day you will be asked 10 New quick-fire general knowledge quiz questions, Can you get them all correct on your 1st try?

Offering over 20 categories to suit all ages and abilities using multiple-choice questions, with the added choice to learn fun facts.
